issue_81.title: Authentication and error handling improvements
issue_81.body:
## Description
This issue addresses authentication flow problems and error handling improvements.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Login with expired token
2. Observe generic error message
3. User gets confused

## Expected Behavior
- Clear error messages
- Automatic token refresh
- Better user experience

## Additional Context
Related to authentication module in src/auth/
See also: https://example.com/docs/auth

## Files Involved
- `src/auth/authentication.js`
- `src/api/client.js`
- `src/components/ErrorDisplay.jsx`

issue_92.title: Feature enhancement request
issue_92.body:
## Feature Request
Add support for advanced code analysis features.

## Use Case
Developers need better insights into code quality and patterns.

## Proposed Solution
1. Implement pattern detection
2. Add quality metrics
3. Generate improvement suggestions

## Additional Notes
This should integrate with existing analysis tools.

issue_closed.title: Fixed: Memory leak in analysis worker
issue_closed.body:
## Problem
Memory usage was growing over time during analysis.

## Solution
Implemented proper cleanup in worker threads.

## Testing
- [x] Unit tests added
- [x] Memory usage verified
- [x] Performance benchmarks passed
